name: Jonas Fulstrand
overview: An unauthorized conversion of Son of Blagger 1983 Alligata Software for the c64. It even appeared on some PD compilations as Son of Blagger. This version was created by Markus Gunnarsson with music by Daniel Falk. Players control Slippery Sid, who is an espionage agent and son of Blagger. Like the first game, the task is to collect a series of keys scattered around the level. Sid must navigate a series of platforms while jumping over robots that guard the keys. Once Sid collects all the keys, he can make his way to the next level by going through a doorway. Like his father, Sid has a limited time to perform this task, and he loses one of his lives if he fails to collect all of them, or if he falls long distances.
